channel.title: Indigo - Advertisement poster
channel.description:
Please tell me what you think! This was [b]my first time ever making a poster[/b] for a server! [b]I'm not looking to criticism comments on the actual server but the poster itself! :)[/b] Sorry it looks a little small and mind the spelling mistakes (lol)!
[IMG width=700]http://i50.tinypic.com/scak5f.png[/img]

item.title: Indigo - Advertisement poster
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Thanks for that Kidpaparoach I never even noticed it was there (mainly because i’m a keyboard noob) I usually edit the text and rasterize them as I go along (not like in the poster) but this is really help full

Read full topic

item.title: Indigo - Advertisement poster
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I see, well if your intending to post it on forums then the size is fine. You should post in the dev section here and on r-s I’m sure you can find someone who is willing to do those jobs for you, it wouldn’t even be too hard either I doubt if you showed some of your work.

I see, well the style hasn’t failed but I personally don’t think it’s suitable for RSPS; the background is a bit random but it still looks aesthetically pleasing which means it works perfectly fine. I see, I’ve gotten pretty used to spell-check too.
Here you go, this is for cs5 (I’m not sure which version you have) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G6C4AMUrgQ0 .

Read full topic

item.title: Indigo - Advertisement poster
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:4, topic:517174”]I know your not asking for comments on the server itself but the server itself looks nice :P.

Ontopic: I don’t like the font you’ve used which says Indigo and the lighting, well I like it but I simply don’t think it looks nice on your poster. The info at the bottom & pictures could be moved a little to the right as the images don’t look perfectly uniform; not a big deal I’m just trying to find things to criticize. Theirs a typo which says something like ‘kill your skill icon’ which you should probably change :P.

I really like it as a whole though, good job.

Edit: After reading Soulcists post I would like to add in I think it’d look better if it was scaled larger and if possible slightly wider.[/quote]

The image was originally meant to fit the whole page (100% width) which I don’t know why it’s not. (But I would fix it if I was serious about server).
Thanks for the comment on the server although it’s not something i’ll be hosting because I hate being alone with a project having somebody manage server etc would be cool (including that if server was released it would not bother me lmao).

OT: The actual theme of the poster was meant to a street/graffiti style (where I clearly failed), my excuse for all the typo’s are that i’m so used to having a spell checker (automatically working) that I don’t take notice (photoshop may having something like this if somebody can show me how to set it up lol). There’s a gap from the footer in case I wanted to add more stuff in!

Read full topic

item.title: Indigo - Advertisement poster
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I know your not asking for comments on the server itself but the server itself looks nice :P.

Ontopic: I don’t like the font you’ve used which says Indigo and the lighting, well I like it but I simply don’t think it looks nice on your poster. The info at the bottom & pictures could be moved a little to the right as the images don’t look perfectly uniform; not a big deal I’m just trying to find things to criticize. Theirs a typo which says something like ‘kill your skill icon’ which you should probably change :P.

I really like it as a whole though, good job.

Edit: After reading Soulcists post I would like to add in I think it’d look better if it was scaled larger and if possible slightly wider.

Read full topic

item.title: Indigo - Advertisement poster
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Soulcist:

The rest of it seems like it’s so little people wouldn’t be interested in straining their eyes (not necessarily straining but you know what I mean) to find what’s in the server.

Is that a good thing? lol

item.title: Indigo - Advertisement poster
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The green parts of the advertisement are a bit… annoying I guess I could say. The rest of it seems like it’s so little people wouldn’t be interested in straining their eyes (not necessarily straining but you know what I mean) to find what’s in the server.
